evidence_pool.name: Laptop Browser History
evidence_pool.description: Browser autofill data reveals personal information

analysis_result.finding: Real name 'Alex Morrison' found in browser autofill settings
analysis_result.evidence_text:
Autofill Profile:
Name: Alex Morrison
Address: 142 Cyber Street, Tech City
Browser: Chrome (Private Mode Disabled)
analysis_result.significance: Establishes real identity behind 'The Null' alias
analysis_result.compliance_notes: Chain of custody maintained, browser data extracted per NIST guidelines

evidence_pool.name: Deleted Email Drafts
evidence_pool.description: Recovered email drafts from recycle bin

analysis_result.finding: Draft email containing attack planning details
analysis_result.evidence_text:
Draft Email (Recovered):
To: [REDACTED]
Subject: Next Phase
Body: The backdoor is ready. Target systems identified. Will execute Friday night when SOC is understaffed.
analysis_result.compliance_notes: File recovered using forensic tools, hash verified

evidence_pool.name: System Registry Entries
evidence_pool.description: Windows registry modifications indicating malware persistence

analysis_result.significance: Shows how malware maintained persistence on system
analysis_result.compliance_notes: Registry exported using forensic imaging tools

evidence_pool.name: Process Memory Analysis
evidence_pool.description: Active process memory containing personal email

analysis_result.finding: Email address 'a.morrison@securemail.com' found in process memory
analysis_result.evidence_text:
Process Memory Dump (PID 3456):
...Login Credentials...
Email: a.morrison@securemail.com
Password: [ENCRYPTED]
Last Login: 2024-03-14 18:42:15
analysis_result.significance: Confirms Alex Morrison's active email account
analysis_result.compliance_notes: Memory dump analyzed using Volatility framework

evidence_pool.name: Encryption Key Fragments
evidence_pool.description: Partial encryption keys in volatile memory

analysis_result.finding: AES encryption key fragments used for data theft
analysis_result.evidence_text:
Memory Offset 0x7FF8A2B4C000:
Key Fragment: 4A3F2E1D...8B9C6A5E
Algorithm: AES-256
Usage: File encryption for exfiltration
analysis_result.compliance_notes: Key material secured and documented per ISO standards

evidence_pool.name: Network Connection History
evidence_pool.description: Active network connections at time of capture

analysis_result.finding: Suspicious outbound connections to command & control servers
analysis_result.significance: Shows active communication with external threat infrastructure
analysis_result.compliance_notes: Network artifacts extracted using netstat analysis

evidence_pool.name: Exfiltrated Data Packets
evidence_pool.description: Network packets containing personal contact information

analysis_result.finding: Phone number +1-555-0142 found in encrypted network traffic
analysis_result.evidence_text:
Packet Analysis:
Decrypted Payload: {'contact': '+1-555-0142', 'name': 'Alex Morrison', 'status': 'primary'}
Timestamp: 2024-03-14 19:15:23
Destination: 185.243.67.89
analysis_result.significance: Provides complete contact information for Alex Morrison
analysis_result.compliance_notes: Network traffic captured and analyzed per RFC guidelines

analysis_result.finding: Command and control protocol revealing attack methodology
analysis_result.evidence_text:
C2 Protocol Analysis:
Command: 'EXFIL_START target_db.sql'
Response: 'ACK 2.5GB transfer initiated'
Encryption: Modified RC4 with custom key schedule
analysis_result.compliance_notes: Protocol analysis documented with packet timestamps

analysis_result.significance: Reveals infrastructure used for malicious activities
analysis_result.compliance_notes: DNS logs extracted from network capture files

evidence_pool.name: File Access Timestamps
evidence_pool.description: File system timestamps showing attack timeline

analysis_result.finding: Systematic file access pattern indicating automated attack

analysis_objectives.title: Analyze Laptop Evidence
analysis_objectives.description: Examine digital artifacts from the suspect's laptop

analysis_objectives.title: Examine Memory Dump
analysis_objectives.description: Analyze RAM memory for volatile evidence

analysis_objectives.title: Review Network Traffic
analysis_objectives.description: Investigate network communications and data exfiltration

analysis_objectives.title: Correlate All Evidence
analysis_objectives.description: Build complete picture of The Null's identity and methods

forensic_standards.chain_of_custody: All evidence items maintain documented chain of custody per ISO/IEC 27037:2012
forensic_standards.hash_verification: MD5 and SHA-256 hashes verified for all evidence sources
forensic_standards.methodology: Analysis conducted following NIST SP 800-86 digital investigation guidelines
forensic_standards.documentation: All findings documented with timestamps and analyst signatures
